about.title: About Us
about.description1: We are a notary firm with over 10 years of experience in Corporate and Registry Law, specializing in consulting and advising both local and foreign companies.
about.description2: We work in collaboration with various professional fields to offer comprehensive and efficient solutions. Our team, led by Notary Felipe La Riva and Notary Rocío Torterola, combines modernity and experience in notarial functions.
about.description3: We are committed to providing personalized service, ensuring legal security with professionalism and trust

collaborators.title: External Partners
collaborators.description: We believe in teamwork and the importance of surrounding ourselves with professionals who share our values of excellence, trust, and commitment.

contact.title: Contact
contact.subtitle: Any questions? Let's talk via Email or WhatsApp.

location.title: Location
location.address: Find us at Sarmiento 1469, Buenos Aires, Argentina.

gestion-notarial-digital.title: Digital Notarial Management
gestion-notarial-digital.description: Technology allows us to streamline and simplify notarial procedures without losing legal security. Through the platform created by the College of Notaries of Buenos Aires City, we offer the possibility of managing documents remotely, with digital signatures and electronic certifications, avoiding unnecessary travel and optimizing time.

compraventa-inmuebles.title: Real Estate Transactions
compraventa-inmuebles.description: Real estate transactions are one of the most relevant acts in a notary office. We provide comprehensive support at each stage, ensuring that the operation is carried out with complete legal security, whether you are buying your first home or making an investment.

constitucion-sociedades.title: Company Formation
constitucion-sociedades.description: We support entrepreneurs and local and foreign companies in the incorporation, modification, and dissolution of companies. We advise on choosing the most suitable corporate type, including S.A., S.A.S., S.R.L., and other business organization models.

fideicomisos.title: Trusts
fideicomisos.description: Trusts are a versatile tool used in various fields, especially in the real estate sector. They are employed for land acquisition, project development, and subsequent commercialization, providing security and transparency to all involved parties.

planificacion-patrimonial.title: Estate Planning
planificacion-patrimonial.description: We guide you in planning your estate, ensuring that donations and wills align with your wishes and family needs. We analyze each case to find the best legal option and provide peace of mind to your loved ones.

actas-notariales.title: Notarial Acts
actas-notariales.description: Notarial acts are public documents that certify events witnessed by the notary. They are essential to guarantee the truthfulness and authenticity of certain situations, providing legal security to those who require them.

poderes-notariales.title: Notarial Powers
poderes-notariales.description: A power of attorney is a document through which one person authorizes another to act on their behalf. We provide guidance in drafting and granting general or special powers, ensuring they fit your needs.

contratos-privados.title: Private Contracts
contratos-privados.description: We draft and formalize private contracts for various situations, such as lease agreements, loans (mutuals), money donations, and counter-documents, ensuring their legal validity.

autorizaciones-permisos.title: Authorizations and Permits
autorizaciones-permisos.description: We manage authorizations for minors to travel within and outside the country and draft driving permits for vehicles, boats, and aircraft, allowing third parties to drive with the corresponding legal authorization.

certificaciones-notariales.title: Notarial Certifications
certificaciones-notariales.description: We carry out certifications of signatures, copies, and documents, guaranteeing their authenticity and legal validity. This service is essential for administrative, commercial, and legal procedures.

trust.title: Featured Clients
trust.description: We are proud to support businesses and entrepreneurs in their growth, providing notarial advice with professionalism and commitment. Throughout our history, we have worked  with various sectors, offering solutions tailored to each need. Here we share some of the outstanding clients who have placed their trust in us. Each of them is part of our history and the value we seek to bring to each project.
